name: Text2Image
author: Mario Spinaci

sections.description: One problem applicant on the Web is the inability to use special plugin, with this plugin can work around this problem. Indeed loading in the directory “fonts/” the font you want, we can convert any text string or title in the images. The interface is very simple and with a very comprehensive guide that can be found at the following link. http://text2image.webup.org
sections.installation:
1. Upload the directory text2image to your /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. You can find the plugin at menu Themes
  4. Now you’re ready to trasform the text in pictures 😀

short_description: This plugin allows to convert the text to an image, like this one has the option to use the web, even font that the visitor has not in your PC.
